00018 inline int ToFixed( float x )
00019 {
00020         return ( int )( x * 1024.0 );
00021 }
00022 
00023 inline bool IsPosEqual( const SVec3& p0, const SVec3& p1 )
00024 {
00025         return ( Abs( p0.x - p1.x ) <= GR_SMALLEST_UNIT &&
00026                          Abs( p0.y - p1.y ) <= GR_SMALLEST_UNIT &&
00027                          Abs( p0.z - p1.z ) <= GR_SMALLEST_UNIT );
00028 }

00038 //----------------------------------------------------------
00039 GrPolygonEdgeList::GrPolygonEdgeList( GrPolygonGroup* group )
00040 : _group( group )
00041 , _edges( 0 )
00042 , _vertexEdges( 0 )
00043 , _polygonOffsets( 0 )
00044 , _edgeCount( 0 )
00045 {
00047         _edges = new SEdge[ group->GetVertexCount() ];
00048         _vertexEdges = new unsigned int[ group->GetVertexCount() ];
00049         _polygonOffsets = new unsigned int[ group->GetPolygonCount() ];
00050 
00052         BuildEdgeList();
00053 }
00054 
00055 //----------------------------------------------------------
00056 GrPolygonEdgeList::~GrPolygonEdgeList()
00057 {
00058         delete[] _polygonOffsets;
00059         delete[] _vertexEdges;
00060         delete[] _edges;
00061 }

00068 //----------------------------------------------------------
00069 unsigned int
00070 GrPolygonEdgeList::GetNeighbor( unsigned int polygonIdx, unsigned int polygonEdge ) const
00071 {
00072         const SEdge& edge = _edges[ _vertexEdges[ _polygonOffsets[ polygonIdx ] + polygonEdge ] ];
00073         return ( edge.poly0 != polygonIdx ) ? edge.poly0 : edge.poly1;
00074 }

00081 //----------------------------------------------------------
00082 void
00083 GrPolygonEdgeList::BuildEdgeList()
00084 {
00086         ULRUHash< unsigned int, unsigned int > edgeHash( FindPow2( _group->GetVertexCount() ) );
00087 
00089         unsigned int curVertexEdge = 0;
00090         unsigned int polyCount = _group->GetPolygonCount();
00091         for ( unsigned int i = 0; i < polyCount; ++i )
00092         {
00094                 _polygonOffsets[ i ] = curVertexEdge;
00095 
00097                 const GrPolygon& curPoly = _group->GetPolygon( i );
00098                 unsigned int edgeCount = curPoly.GetVertexCount();
00099                 for ( unsigned int curVertIdx = 0; curVertIdx < edgeCount; ++curVertIdx, ++curVertexEdge )
00100                 {
00102                         unsigned int nextVertIdx = ( curVertIdx + 1 ) % edgeCount;
00103 
00105                         const SPolygonVertex& v0 = curPoly.GetVertex( curVertIdx );
00106                         const SPolygonVertex& v1 = curPoly.GetVertex( nextVertIdx );
00107 
00109                         unsigned int revKey = HashEdge( v1, v0 );
00110                         void* iter = edgeHash.FindFirst( revKey );
00111                         while ( iter != 0 )
00112                         {
00114                                 unsigned int edgeIdx = edgeHash.GetValue( iter );
00115                                 SEdge& curEdge = _edges[ edgeIdx ];
00116 
00118                                 const GrPolygon& neighbor = _group->GetPolygon( curEdge.poly0 );
00119                                 const SPolygonVertex& neighborVert0 = neighbor.GetVertex( curEdge.poly0Verts[ 0 ] );
00120                                 const SPolygonVertex& neighborVert1 = neighbor.GetVertex( curEdge.poly0Verts[ 1 ] );
00121 
00123                                 if ( IsEdgeShared( neighborVert0, neighborVert1, v0, v1 ) )
00124                                 {
00127                                         curEdge.poly1 = i;
00128                                         curEdge.poly1Verts[ 0 ] = curVertIdx;
00129                                         curEdge.poly1Verts[ 1 ] = nextVertIdx;
00130 
00132                                         _vertexEdges[ curVertexEdge ] = edgeIdx;
00133 
00135                                         break;
00136                                 }
00137 
00139                                 iter = edgeHash.FindNext( iter, revKey );
00140                         }
00141 
00143                         if ( iter == 0 )
00144                         {
00146                                 SEdge& newEdge = _edges[ _edgeCount ];
00147                                 newEdge.poly0 = i;
00148                                 newEdge.poly0Verts[ 0 ] = curVertIdx;
00149                                 newEdge.poly0Verts[ 1 ] = nextVertIdx;
00150                                 newEdge.poly1 = ~0;
00151                                 newEdge.poly1Verts[ 0 ] = ~0;
00152                                 newEdge.poly1Verts[ 1 ] = ~0;
00153 
00155                                 _vertexEdges[ curVertexEdge ] = _edgeCount;
00156 
00158                                 unsigned int edgeKey = HashEdge( v0, v1 );
00159                                 edgeHash.Insert( edgeKey, edgeKey, _edgeCount++ );
00160                         }
00161                 }
00162         }
00163 }
00164 
00165 //----------------------------------------------------------
00166 unsigned int
00167 GrPolygonEdgeList::HashEdge( const SPolygonVertex& v0, const SPolygonVertex& v1 )
00168 {
00170         int posData[ 6 ] = 
00171         {
00172                 ToFixed( v0.position.x ),
00173                 ToFixed( v0.position.y ),
00174                 ToFixed( v0.position.z ),
00175                 ToFixed( v1.position.x ),
00176                 ToFixed( v1.position.y ),
00177                 ToFixed( v1.position.z ),
00178         };
00179 
00181         return HashMem32( posData, sizeof( posData ) );
00182 }
00183 
00184 //----------------------------------------------------------
00185 bool
00186 GrPolygonEdgeList::IsEdgeShared( const SPolygonVertex& e0v0, const SPolygonVertex& e0v1,
00187                                                                  const SPolygonVertex& e1v0, const SPolygonVertex& e1v1 )
00188 {
00189         return IsPosEqual( e0v0.position, e1v1.position ) && IsPosEqual( e0v1.position, e1v0.position );
00190 }
